About

Daydreams keep me up at night.

Hi I'm Ben,

I am a software developer based out of Winnipeg, Canada. I've had a lifelong facination with making stuff. Programming started out as a passion project and has turned into my career…. I have a passion for working with small teams on big projects, this lends well to the fact that I've spent much of my career at startups.

Outside of programming, I am an avid camper and hiker, a casual gamer, I can grow a pretty incredible afro, I'm a Fleetwood Mac fan, and an aspiring "maker".

This site is a work in progress. Come back soon for more!

Who am I?

Soft skills

  • Efficient, hands-on learner
  • Fast paced, logic focused programmer
  • Good time magement skills
  • Highly adaptable and competitive

  • Well practiced at designing elegant code

Personality

  • Conscientious, industrious, orderly

  • Recognizes personal growth

Professional Values

Business and wealth creation is not a zero-sum game.
A high priority around organization maximizes potential for success.
Creative stimulation and idea exploration should be central to ones daily process.
Individual accountibility is maximized by working in small groups and benefits all parties.

Continuous Goals

Master the everyday process with grace and balance.
Improve design skill to match development ability.
Practice inner peace through wisdom.
Actively practice creativity to reconnect.
Build software that doesn't cause harm.
Work alongside like minded people.
Continuously improve my workspace.
Learn to take more strategic breaks.
Delegate with care.
Constantly develop my career and skillset.
